high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to the window, then turn left to face the table.
Take the basketball from underneath the edge of the table.
Turn around and walk across the room to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the upper shelf of the desk.
anns.task_desc: To see the basketball in the light.

high_descs: Move across the room to the white desk under the bedroom window
pick up the basketball sitting under the desk
Carry the basketball and move to the wood colored desk located to the right of the bed
Turn on the lamp sitting on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Carry a basketball while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the white table, turn right, walk to the side of the table
Grab the basketball under the table on the floor
Turn left, walk to the desk by the bed
Turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Grab the basketball under the desk, turn on the lamp on the table
